general.saveUp: Save up to 70% on your shipping costs. No fixed fees, no minimum shipping volume required. Manage all your shipments in a single platform.
general.noContract: No contract needed! More than 300 transport services into a single platform.  You can connect all your ecommerce and manage all your shipments in Packlink PRO.
general.curlIsNotInstalled: cURL is not installed or enabled in your PHP installation. This is required for background task to work. Please install it and then refresh this page.

validation.invalidEmail: This field must be valid email.
validation.shortPassword: The password must be at least %s characters long.
validation.invalidPhone: This field must be valid phone number.
validation.nonNegative: Field cannot have a negative value.
validation.invalidLanguage: Field is not a valid language.
validation.invalidPlatformCountry: Field is not a valid platform country.
validation.invalidUrl: Field must be a valid URL.

login.connectYourService:
Connect your service using your key. You'll find it in the
"Packlink Pro API Key" section of the "Settings".
login.chooseYourCountry: Choose your country to start the registration process

register.getToKnowYou: We would like to get to know you better in order to adapt to you and to send you an individual offer
register.monthlyShipmentVolume: What is your monthly shipment volume?
register.termsAndConditions: I accept the Terms of Service and the Privacy Policy of Packlink
register.marketingEmails: I authorise Packlink Shipping S.L. to send me commercial communications by e-mail
register.invalidDeliveryVolume: Field is not a valid delivery volume.

onboardingWelcome.header:
Let's set up basic information so that
you can make shipments
onboardingWelcome.steps:
It's just two steps that we need to go through to offer you the
carrier that best suits your needs

onboardingOverview.header: Almost there! Please check that the entered information is correct or complete it in order to continue.
onboardingOverview.parcelData: Weight %s kg | Height %s cm | Width %s cm | Length %s cm

defaultParcel.description-onboarding: We will use this default data for items that do not have defined dimensions and weight. You can edit them whenever you like via the settings tab.
defaultParcel.description-config: We will use this data for items that do not have defined dimensions and weight.

defaultWarehouse.description-onboarding: We will use this address to create a default sender for all shipments. You will be able to edit it whenever you wish via the settings tab.
defaultWarehouse.description-config: We will use this address to create a default sender for all shipments. You can edit it at any time.
defaultWarehouse.name: Name of contact person

orderStatusMapping.title: Order status
orderStatusMapping.description:
With Packlink you can update your %s order status with shipping information.
You can edit it at any time.

shippingServices.serviceTitleDescription: Customise your shipment by editing it. Your customers will be able to see it.
shippingServices.showCarrierLogo: Show carrier logo to my customers
shippingServices.pricePolicyDescription: The default will be Packlink's basic prices. But you can configure these in a more precise way below.
shippingServices.serviceCountriesDescription: Select the availability for the countries that are supported for your shipping service.
shippingServices.firstPricePolicyDescription:
Perfect, just a couple of steps:

1. Choose whether you want to set them by weight and/or purchase price.

2. Choose a price policy and set it up.

shippingServicesSettings.titleWillBeVisible: This title will be visible to your customers
shippingServicesSettings.choosePricingPolicy: Choose the pricing policy to show your customers
shippingServicesSettings.addPriceForWeightCriteria: Please add price for each weight criteria
shippingServicesSettings.addPriceForPriceCriteria: Please add price for each price criteria
shippingServicesSettings.fixedPricesTotalWeight: Fixed prices based on total weight
shippingServicesSettings.fixedPricesTotalPrice: Fixed prices based on total price
shippingServicesSettings.gettingAvailableShippingService: Getting available shipping services from Packlink PRO. Please wait a moment.
shippingServicesSettings.congrats: Congrats! Your first Shipping Method has been successfully created.
shippingServicesSettings.disablePreviousCarriers: In order to offer you the best possible service, its important to disable your previous carriers. Do you want us to disable them? (recommended)

orderListAndDetails.disablePopUpBlocker: Please disable pop-up blocker on this page in order to bulk open shipment labels
orderListAndDetails.draftIsBeingCreated: Draft is currently being created in Packlink PRO
orderListAndDetails.createOrderDraft: Create order draft in Packlink PRO
orderListAndDetails.draftCreateFailed: Previous attempt to create a draft failed. Error: %s
orderListAndDetails.shipmentOrderNotExist: Order with shipment reference %s doesn't exist in the shop
orderListAndDetails.orderNotExist: Order with ID %s doesn't exist in the shop
orderListAndDetails.bulkFailCreateFail: Unable to create bulk labels file
orderListAndDetails.draftOrderDelayed: Creation of the draft is delayed
orderListAndDetails.completeServicesSetup: You need to complete the services setup to create order draft.

checkoutProcess.choseDropOffLocation: This shipping service supports delivery to pre-defined drop-off locations. Please choose location that suits you the most by clicking on the "Select drop-off location" button.
checkoutProcess.changeAddress: There are no delivery locations available for your delivery address. Please change your address.

locationPicker.searchBy: Search by location name, id or address
